entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 15. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the evening. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border overnight then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then to 60 gusting to 90 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
